data.title: Pauline Smith Divers Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Pauline Smith Divers, age 95 of Rocky Mount went to be with her Lord and Savior, October 29, 2023.  She was born to the late Ray Silas Smith and Livie Brown Smith on June 18, 19...
data.text:
Pauline Smith Divers, age 95 of Rocky Mount went to be with her Lord and Savior, October 29, 2023. She was born to the late Ray Silas Smith and Livie Brown Smith on June 18, 1928. In addition to her parents, she was preceded in death by her husband Glenwood Allen Divers; daughter, Melissa Divers Lance; brother Silas Alvin Smith; grandson, Travis Hood; sisters, Lucille Smith Dillon, Goldie Smith Pugh, Vaughnie Smith Southall, and Christine Angle. Pauline was a member of Rocky Mount Christian Church. She worked with Special Ed and Chapter I Students.

Left to cherish her life and memory are her son, Mark Allen Divers and wife Marie of Wirtz, VA, grandchildren, Megan Marie Divers, Mallory Lynn Divers, Madalyn Grace Divers; great-grandsons, Nikola Johnson, Dayton Havens, Wesson Havens; great-granddaughter, Irellia Barnes; sister, Shirley Lanni of Florida; many cousins, nieces, nephews and friends.

Funeral services will be conducted 2 PM Wednesday, November 1, 2023 at Conner-Bowman Funeral Home with Dr. Jackie Spence officiating. Interment will follow in Franklin Memorial Park. Her family will receive friends one hour prior to the service beginning at 1 PM at the funeral home.

Arrangements by Conner-Bowman Funeral Home, 62 VA Market Place Drive, Rocky Mount, VA 24151.
